titleStmt.title: Upon the meeting of the sons of the clergy at a sermon preached before them in Saint Pauls church the eighth of November, 1655 specifying their several capacities, as they stood in the time of the law, and now under the gospel / by E. G.
titleStmt.author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
